member.name: T:Enterprise.Patterns.Outbox.Model.MinimalOutboxMessage
member.summary: A condensed representation of the outbox message used for processing the outbox message and persisting the status metadata.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Patterns.Outbox.Model.OutboxOptions.IntervalInSeconds
member.summary: Determines how often the background job should run.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Patterns.Outbox.Model.OutboxOptions.BatchSize
member.summary: Determines many items will be loaded and processed in a single run.
